sentences.english: He doesn't get along with anybody in the office.
sentences.chinese: 他和辦公室任何人都處不來。

sentences.english: Some of the most popular expressions are those that are guaranteed not to offend anyone.
sentences.chinese: 一些最流行的表達是那些保證不會得罪任何人的表達。

sentences.english: Tell no one, she says to him in her note, they are watching.
sentences.chinese: 她在郵件裏說，別告訴任何人，他們正在監視你。

sentences.english: Mr. Kamkar, however, said he did not create it to violate anyone’s privacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是Kamkar表示他沒有打算侵犯任何人的隱私。

sentences.english: He swims faster than any other student in his class(does).
sentences.chinese: 他比班上其他任何人都遊得快。

sentences.english: In term-time they start work later and finish earlier than anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 在學期時間，他們開始和完成的工作早於任何人。

sentences.english: Alaric: I trust you not to say anything about this to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你不會把今天的事告訴任何人。

sentences.english: However, our chat you can no acquaint anybody, even 4 swords also not competence.
sentences.chinese: 不過，我們的談話你不能告訴任何人，連四劍也不能。

sentences.english: He perfms Hamlet better than anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他演哈姆雷特比任何人都演得好。

sentences.english: For anyone involved I'm sure the first call was mortifying.
sentences.chinese: 對任何人來說第一個電話必然是令人氣惱。

sentences.english: The new laws empower the police to stop anybody in the street.
sentences.chinese: 新法令授予警方可在街上截停任何人的權力。

sentences.english: He was jealous of nobody's achievements.
sentences.chinese: 他不嫉妒任何人的成就。

sentences.english: They left the school in a hurry, without saying goodbye to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有同任何人辭別，就匆匆離開了學校。

sentences.english: We're not trying to teach anybody any specific thing.
sentences.chinese: 我們不去嘗試教任何人任何具體的事情。

sentences.english: But Hu did not ask anyone.
Any man can be a father.

definition: lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
high ranking official (old)/term of endearment between spouses (old)/(from the Tang Dynasty onwards) term used by the emperor for his subjects (old)/honorific (old)
